item.title: Metaphor: ReFantazio ‘Guidebook Edition’ digital bundle now available
item.content:encoded:
The October 2025-announced Metaphor: ReFantazio “Guidebook Edition” digital bundle is now available for $79.99 / £65.99 / €79.99, publisher ATLUS and developer Studio Zero announced. Users who own the base game can upgrade via the “Guidebook Edition Upgrade” for $14.99.

Here is an overview of the new edition, via its store pages:

Forge bonds and win over a kingdom divided in this award-winning fantasy RPG.

The Metaphor: ReFantazio Guidebook Edition includes a 55-page Essential Digital Strategy Guide (available in English only). The Essential Digital Strategy Guide is a carefully curated and re-edited version of the printed complete 592-page Official Strategy Guide by Future Press and features an in-depth introduction to the game’s story and mechanics, along with a walkthrough of the game’s first arc. As players advance, the guide provides an optimized schedule for the remainder of the journey, helping them maximize their in-game progression and experience.

Included contents:

  • Digital base game
  • Essential Digital Strategy Guide (available in English only)
  • Digital art book
  • Digital soundtrack
  • Shujin Academy School Uniform (seven), Battle Background Music, and Battle Jingle Set
  • Jouin High School Uniform (seven), Battle Background Music, and Battle Jingle Set

Metaphor: ReFantazio is available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store.
